description:
winLAME is an easy to use encoder for many audio formats, including MP3, Opus, Ogg Vorbis and more.


Today I released winLAME 2024 release 1, which corresponds to the build number 2.24.1.152. The release contains the following updates since the version "2023 release 1":
The following bug fixes are included:
- fixed adding CD eject task after each track (#12)
- disable AAC object types other than "Low complexity", as faac produce incorrect files and has selecting object types disabled itself, as well (#14)
The following encoding library were updated:
- libfaad2 2.11.1
- mpg123 1.32.9
- opus 1.5.2
- taglib 2.0.0
